title: solar_direct_water_pumping_midday
summary: Water pumping operation conducted using direct solar power during peak sunlight hours.
description: Water was pumped into a storage tank during peak sunlight hours using electricity generated directly from solar panels. This operation was intentionally scheduled between approximately 11:00 and 14:00 to avoid drawing power from stored batteries and to utilize direct solar generation efficiently.

external_reference.note: External reference provided for verification only.
